## PathPointsControlsProps interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PathPointsControlsProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [duration?](./controls.pathpointscontrolsprops.duration.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Transition duration, defaults to 1 |
|  [ease?](./controls.pathpointscontrolsprops.ease.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Transition easing, defaults to power1 |
|  [swipeThreshold?](./controls.pathpointscontrolsprops.swipethreshold.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Threshold of swipe distance that triggers a transition. Defaults to 60 |
|  [wheelThreshold?](./controls.pathpointscontrolsprops.wheelthreshold.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Threshold of wheel delta that triggers a transition. Defaults to 15 |
